trans-unit.target: Be kindly informed that sufficient supplies have been stockpiled, and thus we will be proceeding with the concerted works. Please refer to the skybuilders' board for the schedule.
In the upcomin' session, we're plannin' to complete the first stage of works. If you haven't already, check the skybuilders' board for details.
First stage works are complete─well done, everyone! Now it's time to prepare for the next, so let's keep the supplies comin', eh?
Be kindly informed that sufficient supplies have been stockpiled, and thus we will be proceeding with the concerted works. Please refer to the skybuilders' board for the schedule.
In the upcomin' session, we're plannin' to complete the second stage of works. If you haven't already, check the skybuilders' board for details.
Second stage works are complete─well done, everyone! Now it's time to prepare for the next, so let's keep the supplies comin', eh?
Be kindly informed that sufficient supplies have been stockpiled, and thus we will be proceeding with the concerted works. Please refer to the skybuilders' board for the schedule.
In the upcomin' session, we're plannin' to complete the third stage of works. If you haven't already, check the skybuilders' board for details.
With that, all works in the Mendicant's Court are complete! You can rightly be proud of yourselves, all of you!
Be kindly informed that sufficient supplies have been stockpiled, and thus we will be proceeding with the concerted works. Please refer to the skybuilders' board for the schedule.

We've done it, everyone! The Mattock stretches out towards a brighter tomorrow! Let's not rest on our laurels, though, eh? We're gettin' started on Saint Roelle's Dais next, and for that we'll need more supplies!

An' there it is! Featherfall's ready to assume its role as the livin', breathin' heart of the Firmament. But no rest for the weary─aye, there's still work to be done on the Abacus.

We've done it! The Abacus stretches out toward a more prosperous future for the Firmament! Let's not rest on our laurels, though, eh? We're gettin' started on Hoarfrost Hall next, and for that we'll need more supplies!

We've done it! Hoarfrost Hall is ready to welcome adventurers from the realm over to their new home! Hold your heads high, skybuilders─you've done a great service to Ishgard today!

We've done it! Bright Ballad's Passage beckons us to a resoundingly glorious future. Next, we'll be startin' in on the first stage of works for the eastern Risensong Quarter, so keep those supplies comin'!

In the upcomin' session, we're plannin' to complete works for Snowsoak Springs. If you haven't already, check the skybuilders' board for details.
An' that'll complete works for Snowsoak Springs! As our final task, we'll be raisin' a monument o' sorts. Be sure to check the skybuilders' board for details.
And with that, the reconstruction of the Firmament is complete at last! Stand tall, skybuilders─you've done all of Ishgard proud today!
